remarks: Show that a given element is the identity element of a magma. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Dec-2014.)
statement:
ismgmid.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
ismgmid.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
ismgmid.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
ismgmid2.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. B ) $.
ismgmid2.l $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> ( U .+ x ) = x ) $.
ismgmid2.r $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> ( x .+ U ) = x ) $.
ismgmid2 $p |- ( ph -> U = .0. ) $.
$d .+ x $.
$d .0. x $.
$d B x $.
$d G x $.
$d U x $.
$d ph x $.
